ygData.subject: Re: lost mana when target corners
ygData.msgSnippet: Does this really Happen? I could swear that earlier, when my group was hunting the mino caves, I could hit a mino that was around the corner. I would make my
ygData.messageBody:
Does this really Happen? I could swear that earlier, when my group was
hunting the mino caves, I could hit a mino that was around the corner. I
would make my stand near that lava lamp. The Tank would venture deep into
the cave maze and when he had a mino on him he would gsay"incoming". I then
simply targeted that tank with the corresponding F1- F5 keys and then hit my
/Assist hot key. The mino that my tanks was currently fighting was
automatically targeted and I could cast Away. Heck , I hardly ever moved
past the lamp and hardly ever even saw the fearsome minos till the were
dead. I never got the messg that the I couldnt see the target. Is this all
my imagination?
Kueken, Mith Marr
-----Original Message-----
From: Star Gazer <lsgazer@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 6:33 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] lost mana when target corners


>From: Star Gazer <lsgazer@...>
>
>Does it bug anyone besides me how you lose mana when you're chasing a
>fleeing monster down a corridor, say BlackBurrow or Mistmoore, and the
>target JUST rounds a corner before the timer has finished? "You cannot
>see your target", the mana is lost. I can understand the spell not
>connecting, but why the mana loss? Drives me nuts.
>
>_________________________________________________________
